column7: Microeconomic analysis including value and distribution theory; analysis of the pricing of the factors of production integrated in a micro-general equilibrium context which builds towards explaining the resource allocation process. Prerequisite: ECON 102 or equivalent. MATH 220, MATH 221, MATH 234 or equivalent.
column9: Prerequisite: ECON 102 or equivalent. MATH 220, MATH 221, MATH 234 or equivalent.
column11: First priority for enrollment will be given to students in curricula that require this course.
